## Zoom

## \+ Saasbox

Use this page as a central location to download your software.

[Get started now](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/integration/zoom)

### We started as a UX design and innovation agency

For those who don’t know yet, we used to be a design agency. We started évolt in 2015 to help clients build and improve digital products and the overall experience of their services. We could work with large international companies on their innovation strategy such as creating a digital product from scratch with tiny startups. We were a young team of UX/UI designers, UX researchers, developers, digital marketing experts, etc.

### The golden age of the design thinking approach

The ‘gold rush time’ of design thinking is happening now. As I said, from freelancers to large consultant companies, everyone sells design skills. Indeed, from 2015 to theses days, we saw two phenomenons:

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/634054c00f60203c4cb30692_pexels-elvis-2528118%207.png)

### Benifits  of UX :

- The rise of UX design freelancers
- The first one is the rise of independent experts
- Now common for them to work with freelancers
- Large organizations compete now

### When Capgemini, Mckinsey, Accenture, and IBM became design experts in their field

The last thing that pushed us to change our model and build a collaborative UX design tools was passion. Design is more than a methodology for us; it is a state of mind. And we want to incorporate that vision into intuitive products that will guide our users to a new way of thinking. We love building digital things and are like kids making a treehouse. We are proud of it, and we want to invite you in  So, we are pleased to invite you to join our community .

## What’s a Rich Text element?

The rich text element allows you to create and format headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, images, and video all in one place instead of having to add and format them individually. Just double-click and easily create content.

### Static and dynamic content editing

> A rich text element can be used with static or dynamic content. For static content, just drop it into any page and begin editing. For dynamic content, add a rich text field to any collection and then connect a rich text element to that field in the settings panel. Voila!

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/607d26b50a22aaadacc1e4dc_605890582fa058a6dc964c1c_1616416850520-image16.jpg)

Caption

#### How to customize formatting for each rich text

_Headings, paragraphs, blockquotes, figures, images, and figure captions can all be styled after a class is added to the rich text element using the "When inside of" nested selector system._

You get access to all the features promised on the Pricing page to see for yourself how powerful our AI-based crypto research platform is, helping you find profitable opportunities.

Do I get charged automatically after the trial ends?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

Yes, our payment processor will try to charge the card on your account after your trial period is over.

Can I cancel my account?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

If you feel like you’re not ready to use Token Metrics yet, you can cancel your plan any time you want by going to your Settings page and under the Subscription tab.

Can I get a refund?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

As long as you cancel your plan within 7 days of subscription, you can ask for the refund by contacting our support team on the website. This is more than enough to test our platform and see if it works for you.

Can I pay with Crypto?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

For now, we only accept debit and credit cards. However, we are actively working on accepting more payment types.

Can I get a free trial to test the VIP plan?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You can not sign up for a trial VIP plan at this moment.

Can I upgrade my account in the future to access more features?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

Yes, you can upgrade any time you want to make the best out of Token Metrics. You will be issued a pro-rated refund for unused days on the current plan and then upgraded to the new plan.

How can I join the private Telegram groups for each plan?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You can join our private Telegram groups to discuss cryptocurrencies by sending our bot a message at [@token\_metrics\_bot](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/reference/style-guide#) on Telegram.

Does Token Metrics trade for me?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

No, Token Metrics does not trade for you. You have to make your own investment decisions after doing your own research.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63591461c338fa894d2a0dce_Ellipse%20blue.png)

## Crypto Data Scientist Intern (US-Remote)

Engineering

Remote

Full time

[Apply for job](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/career/data-scientist-intern)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60a77131308f92eca2edfa50_Ellipse%20105-min.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60a77130952c83559b45a570_Ellipse%20104-min.png)

**Token Metrics** provides **AI-based cryptocurrency ratings** and **price predictions**. Our customers leverage our professional analysts, analytics, and artificial intelligence to become smarter crypto investors.

Token Metrics is seeking a machine learning engineer to assist our team on improving our cryptocurrency machine learning models.

If you're the right person, you've got a **passion for Python**, **neural networks,** **and investing**, have strong analytical skills and the ability to communicate and work in a fast-paced environment.

The duration of the Token Metrics internship program is 3 months. It is an evaluative unpaid internship with the possibility of return offers, depending on the company's needs.

### Responsibilities

- Study and transform data science prototypes
- Design machine learning systems
- Research and implement appropriate ML algorithms and tools
- Develop machine learning applications according to requirements
- Select appropriate datasets and data representation methods
- Run machine learning tests and experiments
- Perform statistical analysis and fine-tuning using test results
- Train and retrain systems when necessary
- Extend existing ML libraries and frameworks
- Keep abreast of developments in the field

### Requirements

- Proficiency in Python
- Proficiency with machine learning and data science strategies

About Token Metrics

Token Metrics helps crypto investors build profitable portfolios using artificial intelligence based crypto indices, rankings, and price predictions.

Token Metrics has a diverse set of customers, from retail investors and traders to crypto fund managers, in more than 50 countries.

# Avalanche (AVAX) Price Prediction 2025, 2030 - Forecast Analysis

Delve into a detailed analysis of Avalanche (AVAX) price predictions and forecasts for 2025 and 2030 to make informed investment decisions.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/6605645e4c74774c955f1c24_PP4.PNG)\\
\\
S. Vishwa](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/author/s-vishwa)

7 Minutes

![Avalanche (AVAX) Price Prediction](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/655396764be29fd2b234d8ac_AVAX%20Price%20Prediction%20.webp)

Table of contents

[Avalanche (AVAX) Overview](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#avalanche-avax-overview) [Historical Performance of Avalanche (AVAX)](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#historical-performance-of-avalanche-avax) [Avalanche (AVAX) Current Fundamentals](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#avalanche-avax-current-fundamentals) [Avalanche (AVAX) Price Prediction - Scenario Analysis](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#avalanche-avax-price-prediction---scenario-analysis) [AVAX Price Prediction - Bullish Scenario](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#avax-price-prediction---bullish-scenario) [AVAX Price Prediction - Bearish Scenario](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#avax-price-prediction---bearish-scenario) [Avalanche (AVAX) Price Prediction - Industry Expert Opinion](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#avalanche-avax-price-prediction---industry-expert-opinion) [Is Avalanche (AVAX) Good to Invest?](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#is-avalanche-avax-good-to-invest) [Risks and Rewards](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#risks-and-rewards) [Ongoing Developments and Future Potential of Avalanche](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#ongoing-developments-and-future-potential-of-avalanche) [Conclusion](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#conclusion) [Frequently Asked Questions](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#frequently-asked-questions) [Disclaimer](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/avalanche-avax-price-prediction#disclaimer)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7877bd7dd2318cd3fe9a_Vector-2.svg)](https://twitter.com/tokenmetricsinc)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b7876de5c8d5e84bc18d0_Vector-1.svg)](https://www.facebook.com/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/601b78762f9c2251084fe444_Vector.svg)](https://www.linkedin.com/company/tokenmetrics/)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/64461a3c22449c30f8100f2a_Blog_YT.svg)](https://www.youtube.com/tokenmetrics?sub_confirmation=1)

In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrencies, Avalanche (AVAX) has emerged as a prominent player. With its unique algorithm and features, AVAX has gained popularity among investors and traders alike.

Many people are now wondering what the future holds for Avalanche and whether its price will continue to rise.

In this article, we will delve into the various factors that can influence the price of AVAX and provide a comprehensive analysis of its price prediction for the coming years.

## Avalanche (AVAX) Overview

Before we dive into the price prediction, let's take a moment to understand what Avalanche is all about. Avalanche is a decentralized smart contract platform that aims to be fast, affordable, and eco-friendly.

It utilizes a native utility token called [AVAX](https://app.tokenmetrics.com/avalanche-2), which serves as the primary medium of exchange within the ecosystem. The maximum supply of AVAX is capped at 720 million, with 360 million initially minted and sold through private and public sales. The remaining 360 million tokens are distributed as staking rewards over time.

Avalanche stands out from other blockchain networks due to its heterogeneous network of blockchains and validator sets. It uses a proof-of-stake (PoS) consensus mechanism, assisted by the unique Avalanche consensus protocol.

This protocol provides a scalable and secure environment for transactions, smart contracts, and network administration.

## Historical Performance of Avalanche (AVAX)

To gain insights into the potential future price movements of AVAX, it is crucial to analyze its historical data. Over the past year, AVAX has experienced both [bullish and bearish](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/bullish-vs-bearish) trends.

# Privacy policy

##### TOKEN METRICS MEDIA LLC 'S (TM) GDPR STATEMENT

As of May 25, 2018, a new privacy law came into effect in the European Union (EU) and the European Economic Area (EEA), and is referred to as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). The GDPR expands privacy rights granted to individuals in the EU and the EEA. Token Metrics INC and its subsidiaries and affiliates (collectively, “TM”) are committed to GDPR compliance, and TM has implemented and will continue to implement GDPR compliance efforts.  The GDPR imposes certain requirements on "data controllers" and "data processors." Under the GDPR, a "data controller" is the individual or entity that determines the purposes for and manner in which personal data is collected, used and processed. TM is, generally speaking, the data controller of the personal information collected by TM. Additionally, the GDPR provides that a "data processor" is a person or entity that processes personal information on behalf of a data controller. Data controllers and data processors are generally required to enter into an agreement with one another to protect the personal information that the data processor obtains from the data controller. TM is working with its data and website service providers that process personal data of EU and EEA parties to implement such agreements.If you have any questions or comments about the TM's privacy practices and its GDPR compliance efforts, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can contact TM at [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support).

##### TM PRIVACY POLICY

TM is committed to the protection of your personal information. This Privacy Policy sets out the basis on which TM collects and uses personal information about you as part of our business activities.

This Privacy Policy describes in detail who is responsible for the personal information that TM collects about you, what personal information is collected, how TM uses such personal information, who TM may disclose it to and your rights and choices in relation to your personal information.

This Privacy Policy generally covers information collected at www.tokenmetrics.com and any other website that TM may have in place now or in the future (collectively, the “TM Website”), but also relates to information collected by TM outside of the TM Website.

###### Who is Responsible for the Personal Information That TM Collects?

For the purposes of data protection law, TM is the data controller as to the personal information that is collected and used as part of its business activities. This is because TM dictates the purpose for which your personal information is used and how TM uses your personal information.

###### What Personal Information Does TM Collect?

While some of the information collected is required for business engagement purposes, other information is voluntarily given by you. The type of personal information that TM may collect could include, but not limited to, the following:

· Your full name, address, phone, fax and email contact information

· Payment information

· Preference information, such as the communications you receive from us

· Information you provide to us for the purposes of attending meetings, events, webinars and other programs

· Any other information relating to you (or other individuals) which you may provide to us

If you are providing personal information to TM relating to a third party, you confirm that you have the consent of the third party to share such personal information with TM and that you have made the information in this Privacy Policy available to the third party.

###### Sensitive Categories of Information

Some countries consider some personal information particularly sensitive. TM only collects this data when voluntarily given by the individual and for statistical purposes only. TM does not share this information with third parties for business purposes. Such information may include the following:

· Date of birth

· Ethnicity, nationality, gender and other demographic information

###### Website Usage Information

TM collects information when you provide it to TM, such as when you use the “contact us” feature on the TM Website or otherwise communicate with TM (such as by email or via TM social media pages).

TM collects certain information automatically when you use the TM Website, such as your IP address and domain name, browser type, history of pages viewed and other usage information about your use of the TM Website. TM collects this information for site administration purposes, such as to analyze this data for trends and statistics. TM may share statistical or aggregated non-personal information about its users with advertisers, business partners, sponsors and other third parties. This data is used to customize THE TM Website content and advertising to deliver a better experience to our users. Please see the section below on cookies for more information.

###### How Does TM Obtain Your Personal Information?

As noted above, we collect information from you in the course of your use of the TM Website. For example, TM collects information from you when you contact or communicate with TM (including through the TM Website, by email or otherwise). TM also collects your personal information while monitoring the TM Website. TM also gathers information about you when you provide it to us or interact with us directly.

###### How Does TM Use The Personal Information It Collects?

TM collects personal information for the following principal purposes; for each purpose, TM has also set out below the legal basis under relevant data protection laws that we rely on to justify this use of your personal information.

###### Purpose

To provide the TM Website to you

‍

To register individuals for TM events;

To communicate with you and to respond to questions that you have raised with TM;

To administer and improve the TM Website;

To process your payment for TM services, products and events;

To send you, or for our third-party partners to send you, information about products, services and events that may be of interest to you based on your preferences;

To administer surveys;

To prevent and detect fraud;

To protect and enforce TM’s legal rights.

###### Legal Bases

For our legitimate business purposes (i.e., the provision of the TM Website) and, depending on the circumstances, to perform a contract between you and TM.

For our legitimate business purposes (i.e., the provision of the TM Website).

For our legitimate business purposes (i.e., the provision of the TM Website, as well as to improve and ensure the security of the TM Website). TM may request your consent in circumstances where a legal justification over and above legitimate interests is required by applicable law (e.g., in relation to our use of certain cookies).

For our legitimate business purposes (i.e., the provision of the TM Website).

For our legitimate business purposes (i.e., the provision of the TM Website). TM may request your consent in circumstances where a legal justification over and above legitimate interests is required by applicable law.

For our legitimate business purposes and for compliance with legal obligations to which we are subject.

###### Who Does TM Share Your Personal Information With?

TM reserves the right to disclose and/or transfer personal information to a third party, if TM has reason to believe that disclosing personal information is necessary to identify, contact or bring legal action against someone who may be causing injury to or interference with (either intentionally or unintentionally) TM rights or property, other TM Website users or anyone else who could be harmed by such activities. Additionally, TM may disclose personal information in response to a subpoena, warrant or other court order, or when TM believes in good faith that a law, regulation, subpoena, warrant or other court order requires it.

TM reserves the right to disclose and/or transfer personal information to a third party in the event of a proposed or actual purchase, sale (including a liquidation, realization, foreclosure or repossession), lease, merger, amalgamation or any other type of acquisition, disposal, transfer, conveyance or financing of all or any portion of TM.

TM may share your information with personal advisors, such as accountants and lawyers, who assist us in carrying out our business activities.

TM may share personal information with third parties engaged to assist TM in providing services to you or to carry out one or more of the purposes described above. These service providers are prohibited from using your personal information for any purpose other than to provide this assistance and are contractually required to protect personal information disclosed by TM and to comply with the general privacy principles described in this Privacy Policy.

If you choose not to provide TM with your personal information, you may still visit the TM Website. However, you may be unable to access certain website options, so as use the TM Website functionality to its fullest extent.

###### Transfer of Personal Information Across Borders

TM is a global organization. TM may allow your personal information to be shared with its related entities or third-party service providers based both within the United States and in other countries. This may entail a transfer of your information from a location within the EEA to outside the EEA, or from outside the EEA to a location within the EEA.

When TM provides your personal information in such instances, such is done in connection with providing you requested information or services, or as required or authorized under law. It is possible the overseas entities which TM shares your information with may not be subject to laws that provide the same level of protection of information as your country of residence, or may not be subject to any privacy obligations. Overseas entities may be required or compelled to disclose your personal information to a third party, such as an overseas authority. Where we transfer information outside of the EEA, we will implement appropriate measures to ensure that your personal information remains protected and secure in accordance with applicable data protection laws. Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although TM uses reasonable efforts to protect your personal information, it cannot guarantee the security of your personal information transmitted to the TM Website and any transmission is at your own risk. Once TM has received your personal information, it will use reasonable and appropriate procedures and security features to try to prevent unauthorized access.

###### Your Rights, Including Removing, Correcting or Updating Personal Information

If you change your mind on how TM discloses or uses your information, or wish to access, correct or update personal information (such as your address), it will endeavor to correct, update or remove the personal data you give us.

THE BELOW SUMMARY APPLIES TO INDIVIDUALS LOCATED IN THE EU AND EEA ONLY: You have certain rights with respect to your personal information. The rights may only apply in certain circumstances and are subject to certain exemptions. Please see the summary below for a summary of your rights and who to contact to exercise them.

##### SUMMARY OF YOUR RIGHTS

**Right of access to your personal information**

You have the right to receive a copy of your personal information that we hold about you, subject to certain exemptions.  TM may require further information in order to respond to your request (for instance, evidence of your identity and information to enable us to locate the specific personal information you require);

Who to contact: TM at [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support)

**Right to rectify your personal information**

You have the right to ask TM to correct your personal information that it holds where it is incorrect or incomplete.

Who to contact: TM at [support@tokenmetrics.com\\
\\
‍](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support)

**Right to erasure of your personal information**

You have the right to ask that TM delete your personal information in certain circumstances. For example (i) where your personal information is no longer necessary in relation to the purposes for which they were collected or otherwise used; (ii) if you withdraw your consent and there is no other legal ground for which TM relies on for the continued use of your personal information; (iii) if you object to the use of your personal information (as set out below); (iv) if TM has used your personal information unlawfully; or (v) if your personal information needs to be erased to comply with a legal obligation.

Who to contact: TM at [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support)

**Right to restrict the use of your personal information**

You have the right to suspend TM’s use of your personal information in certain circumstances. For example (i) where you think your personal information is inaccurate and only for such period to enable TM to verify the accuracy of your personal information; (ii) the use of your personal information is unlawful and you oppose the erasure of your personal information and request that it is suspended instead; (iii) TM no longer needs your personal information, but your personal information is required by you for the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims; or (iv) you have objected to the use of your personal information and TM is verifying whether its grounds for the use of your personal information override your objection.

Who to contact: You may effectuate this right at any time by contacting TM at [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support)

**Right to data portability**

You have the right to obtain your personal information in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format and for it to be transferred to another organization, where it is technically feasible. The right only applies where the use of your personal information is based on your consent or for the performance of a contract, and when the use of your personal information is carried out by automated (i.e. electronic) means.

Who to contact: You may effectuate this right at any time by contacting TM at [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support)

**Right to object to the use of your personal information**

You have the right to object to the use of your personal information in certain circumstances. For example (i) where you have grounds relating to your particular situation and TM uses your personal information for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party); and (ii) if you object to the use of your personal information for direct marketing purposes.

Who to contact: You may effectuate this right at any time by contacting TM at [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support)

**Right to withdraw consent**

You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time where TM relies on your consent to use your personal information.

Who to contact: You may effectuate this right at any time by contacting TM at  [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support)

**Right to complain to the relevant data protection authority**

You have the right to complain to the relevant data protection authority where you think TM has not used your personal information in accordance with data protection law.

Who to contact: Find your National Data Protection Authority online

##### Links to Other Websites

The TM Website may contain links to other websites not controlled or legally affiliated with TM. These sites are not controlled by TM and TM is not responsible for any content contained on any such website. TM is not responsible for the privacy practices employed by other sites, and the privacy practices employed by such sites may not be the same as TM’s practices. As with the TM Website, you should become familiar with any external party's privacy policy before visiting and/or providing any personal information through any such site.

TM may terminate access for any party who is found to repeatedly provide or post protected material without necessary rights and permissions.

##### Cookies

TM uses cookies to manage its website. A cookie is a small file placed on your computer when you visit a website. Cookies are used to store information to manage your website experience such as your type of web browser. A cookie can also store preference information to customize your website experience.

Cookies help us understand how parties use our website so TM can design better services in the future. You can adjust your web browser to disable cookies. However, TM may not be able to provide you with all the services or functionality available on the TM Website if you choose to disable cookies.  You may also remove TM cookies from your browser. Please refer to your browser’s help menu for instructions

##### Contacting TM with Questions, Concerns or Complaints

Should you have any questions, concerns or a complaint about this Privacy Policy, please contact TM at [support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com?subject=Support). You are entitled to make an anonymous complaint or inquiry in relation to this Privacy Policy or your privacy rights; however, TM may require you to identify yourself if required by law or it is impracticable for us to deal with your matter otherwise.

##### TM Website and Communications Terms of Use

Please refer to TM’s Terms of Use on all issues related to accessing, posting and sharing information through the TM Website and communication services.

##### Changes to The TM Privacy Policy

Any material changes to the Privacy Policy will be posted on this page. The updated Privacy Policy will take effect as soon as it has been updated.

Aave, often regarded as a cornerstone of decentralized finance (DeFi), is a beacon of innovation in the ever-evolving cryptocurrency landscape. As we venture into the realm of cryptocurrencies, understanding the essence of Aave is paramount.

In this article, we'll explore Aave's historical performance, current fundamentals, and potential for long-term investment. Discover what industry experts say and evaluate the risks and rewards of investing in Aave.

## Historical Data of AAVE

Aave's journey has been nothing short of spectacular. From its inception, Aave has continually adapted and expanded, redefining the DeFi landscape. Its historical data showcases significant growth and resilience, which has attracted the attention of both institutional and retail investors.

![AAVE price chart](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/653fec8c6effc2aaa4a4a082_KCGhrrmaU9_s3HVXBBY97ixIOGpntGsiIj78E1r8ktTJdL8hLyT-MFNzgoHKEicyxS6xTskfljPdQ0s6u5KZlXYDmS0Q4YjK7y6dJqWplSO3msLuRBIeNYS9UmrLFfJb6l5aznYKosD6UlURvxeKmXI.png)

_AAVEUSD 1W - Bullish price evolution since inception - TradingView_

## AAVE Current Fundamentals

At the core of Aave's fundamentals lies its robust [lending](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/crypto-lending) and borrowing protocols, fostering an active ecosystem. It boasts impressive metrics, including Total Value Locked (TVL), a crucial indicator of Aave's utility in the DeFi space. Moreover, its governance model allows AAVE token holders to have a say in the platform's direction.

![AAVE price analysis](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/653fec8cb21cd2941533145c_hg7SUfeQkAHdG26x9CV4T01ylr5Enk6esJG9pkAk-oUCJcgGCDyI6U-nkNewQ7xIR8GXv67oahkjGHKugPXg0uA2A_2OqFKwp4b-hfuASaZHyzznp6ngBuBZYkRfMtWQt3wz_e7X9B74e50LtDOzARo.png)

_AAVE - Total Value Locked since inception - TradingView_

## AAVE Price Prediction - Industry Expert Opinion

Prominent crypto analysts and experts anticipate a promising future for Aave. Their predictions are rooted in [Aave's track record](https://app.tokenmetrics.com/aave) of innovation and DeFi dominance. While we should approach price predictions with caution, experts suggest that Aave has the potential to appreciate significantly in the long term.

![AAVE price prediction](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/653fec8cca6721b189a5619d_0GB75xV7dDDwmS3sxlpHsb9V2LtPqd4cgpKt1PzYnr88dj79CNtVBI4IfWYj30W3B9881kjQkDC6_ihnFfYGxPw45DuimDDOal-pBQPSO6Up1l0FdhtMUdli4XPb7IDQgRdbyCfSmh5buFwkyM95YM4.png)

### A Closer Look at Aave's Price Predictions

In 2023, various sources have weighed in on Aave's potential price range. Here's a comprehensive summary:

- [CoinCodex](https://coincodex.com/crypto/aave-token/price-prediction/) predicts an average price of $64.14 for Aave in 2023.
- [Changelly](https://changelly.com/blog/aave-price-prediction/) forecasts a price range of $68.84 to $76.82, averaging $72.08.
- [CoinDCX](https://coindcx.com/blog/price-predictions/aave-price-2022-2023-2024-2025/) expects the AAVE price to reach approximately INR 5000, around $66.67.
- [The News Crypto](https://thenewscrypto.com/aave-price-prediction/) takes an even more optimistic stance, predicting an average price of $85.85 for Aave in 2023.
- [InsideBitcoins](https://insidebitcoins.com/news/aave-price-prediction-what-could-be-the-next-milestone) suggests that Aave could achieve a maximum price of $87.75, an average of $78.85, and a minimum of $76.36 by the end of 2023.
- [BitScreener](https://bitscreener.com/coins/aave/price-prediction) estimates that AAVE's price in 2023 will reach $95.36, with a minimum expected value of $47.97.

Moving into 2024, the predictions continue:

- [CoinCodex](https://coincodex.com/crypto/aave-token/price-prediction/) anticipates a yearly low for Aave at $58.17 and a potential high of $453.07.
- [Changelly](https://changelly.com/blog/aave-price-prediction/) suggests an average AAVE rate of around $103.56, with a minimum and maximum value of $100.58 and $120.68, respectively.
- [Ovenadd](https://ovenadd.com/aave-coin-price-prediction/) expects the average price of the Aave Coin to remain around $199.12.
- [Telegaon](https://telegaon.com/aave-price-prediction-2022-2023-2025-2030/) predicts an average price level of approximately $216.17.
- [Bitnation](https://bitnation.co/forecast/aave-price-prediction/) foresees a maximum price of $181.54 for Aave in 2024, with an average price around $162.09.

Please note that these are predictions, and actual results may vary. It's always recommended to do your research before making any investment decisions.

## Is AAVE Good to Invest in?

The answer depends on your investment goals and risk tolerance. As a pioneering DeFi platform, Aave continues to set the bar high.

Its innovative lending and borrowing solutions make it an attractive choice for long-term investors looking to diversify their portfolios.

**Note** \- [**Start Your Free Trial Today and Uncover Your Token's Price Prediction and Forecast on Token Metrics.**](https://app.tokenmetrics.com/subscription/checkout/ADVANCED)

## Risks and Rewards

As with any investment, Aave comes with its risks and rewards. The DeFi sector, while innovative, is not immune to market volatility and regulatory changes.

Investors must weigh these potential risks against the rewards, which include the opportunity to earn interest through lending and liquidity provision.

## Future Potential of AAVE

The future potential of AAVE is rooted in its continued development and innovation. Aave's roadmap includes improvements in scalability and [security](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/crypto-security), demonstrating its commitment to staying at the forefront of DeFi. As DeFi expands, Aave is well-positioned to maintain its pivotal role.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q1. What is Aave's core offering?**

Aave primarily focuses on decentralized lending and borrowing, offering a wide array of assets for users to engage with.

**Q2. How can I participate in Aave's governance?**

AAVE token holders can participate in the platform's governance by voting on proposals and contributing to its direction.

**Q3. What distinguishes Aave from other DeFi platforms?**

Aave stands out with its innovative flash loans, efficient collateral management, and active ecosystem, setting a high standard in the DeFi space.

**Q4. How can I assess Aave's potential for the long term?**

Aave's potential for the long term can be evaluated by considering its fundamentals, roadmap, and industry expert opinions. However, please remember that investing in cryptocurrencies carries inherent risks.

**Q5. Where can I find a more in-depth analysis of Aave's long-term potential?**

To delve deeper into Aave's long-term potential, we recommend using the [Token Metrics AI analytical tools](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/analytics-platform), consulting various crypto industry experts, reading whitepapers, and staying updated with the latest developments in the DeFi space.

## Expert Insights

Crypto experts and analysts from the industry share their thoughts on Aave's long-term potential:

- **CaptainAltcoin**: The AAVE governance token is recognized for its strong tokenomics, and AAVE itself is often regarded as a white horse in the DeFi industry. It has sustained the rapid growth of significant business operations while simultaneously focusing on expanding into larger markets outside its current circle through early compliance.

- **Coinpedia**: The fundamental strengths of the protocol, such as borrowing, lending, staking, liquidity pools, and flash loans, still hold significant prominence in the industry, which could help the digital asset munch higher candles.

- **Cryptopolitan**: Aave continues to have long-term potential by providing financial services to the underbanked while allowing those who [stake](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/crypto-staking-how-to-stake-cryptocurrencies) their tokens to earn interest on loans.

## Conclusion

Aave has demonstrated its resilience, innovation, and fundamental strength in the dynamic DeFi landscape. While the potential for long-term growth is promising, investors must research, evaluate risks, and consider expert opinions when deciding if Aave aligns with their investment objectives. Remember, the crypto world is ever-evolving, and vigilance is essential when considering any investment.

![Stripe](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/634054c00f602032b6b30707_image%208.svg)

## Stripe

## \+ Saasbox

Use this page as a central location to download your software.

[Get started now](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/integration/stripe)

### We started as a UX design and innovation agency

For those who don’t know yet, we used to be a design agency. We started évolt in 2015 to help clients build and improve digital products and the overall experience of their services. We could work with large international companies on their innovation strategy such as creating a digital product from scratch with tiny startups. We were a young team of UX/UI designers, UX researchers, developers, digital marketing experts, etc.

### The golden age of the design thinking approach

The ‘gold rush time’ of design thinking is happening now. As I said, from freelancers to large consultant companies, everyone sells design skills. Indeed, from 2015 to theses days, we saw two phenomenons:

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054c00f602044abb3060d/634054c00f60203c4cb30692_pexels-elvis-2528118%207.png)

### Benifits  of UX :

- The rise of UX design freelancers
- The first one is the rise of independent experts
- Now common for them to work with freelancers
- Large organizations compete now

### When Capgemini, Mckinsey, Accenture, and IBM became design experts in their field

The last thing that pushed us to change our model and build a collaborative UX design tools was passion. Design is more than a methodology for us; it is a state of mind. And we want to incorporate that vision into intuitive products that will guide our users to a new way of thinking. We love building digital things and are like kids making a treehouse. We are proud of it, and we want to invite you in  So, we are pleased to invite you to join our community .

## Frequently Asked Questions

How is Token Metrics different from other crypto tools?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Our AI studies 150+ data points on each token, giving you deeper insights than most humans can find alone.

I'm new to crypto. Is Token Metrics right for me?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Absolutely! Our AI explains everything in simple terms, helping you learn as you invest.

How much can I expect to make?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

While we can't promise specific returns, our AI has helped many users spot opportunities for significant gains.

Is my money safe with Token Metrics?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

We never touch your money. We just provide information to help you make smarter decisions with your own investments.

What if I don't like it?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b2be0636f254a9b46c94c_Dark-FAQ%20Dropdown.svg)

Try it risk-free! If you're not happy, cancel anytime during your trial. No questions asked.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6360ebdbc696262e10b01a31_Aff_icon_1.svg)

###### Get Started In Minutes

Step 1: [Sign up](https://affiliate.tokenmetrics.com/signup/?_ga=2.218362265.1697768403.1667195440-2013196138.1630001345) to become an affiliate.

Step 2: Share your own, unique affiliate link with your audience.

Step 3: Earn a 40% recurring commission on referrals for 12 months.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6360f297d110a164d2132175_Aff_icon_2.svg)

###### Share on Your Platforms

Youtube, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Blogs, and more.

Add value to Your Discord and Telegram Communities.

Use Token Metrics' reliable information and marketing resources to help you.

![Affiliates icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63527fe99efb3c3580a84ae7_Nav_11.svg)

###### Token Metrics Customers: Boost Your Earnings

Exclusive for Customers: Automatically part of the affiliate program upon subscription.

Immediate Enrollment: Join the program seamlessly with any plan.

Referral Rewards: Earn 40% commission on successful signups using your special link.

![grow portfolio icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/634ea0931732694bd9b8e8c5_2.svg)

###### Partner with a Renowned Crypto Brand: Token Metrics

Enhance Content: Integrate Token Metrics research for insightful crypto analysis.

Leverage AI Power: Use our AI-driven grades, analytics, and indicators for precision.

Access Advanced Tools: Offer unique insights with bull/bear indicators and indices.

![Career icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63527a04499532f15e6522aa_Nav_6.svg)

###### Did you know?

# $2M+

Commissions Paid

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/654b224702e81aaab21ebca7_Dark-Ellipse4.webp)

## Token Metrics Affiliate Program

Earn 40% recurring commissions paid in United States Dollars (USD) for 12 months, plus 10% recurring commissions on the sales of your sub-affiliates for 12 months. [Learn more](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1IHNJ-YZI3HvoLy5--XOK5EI1CF66_jiJwZqEw9uW0fw/edit)

# Questions?  Feelfreetocontactus.

Thank you! Your submission has been received!

Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63591461c338fa894d2a0dce_Ellipse%20blue.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63591461c338fa894d2a0dce_Ellipse%20blue.png)

## Get in touch with us through the right channels.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6360cb77798bc2d41f046650_Contact_icon.svg)

###### Help & Support

Check out our support docs to find answers to common questions.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/603f16412d15ef27b82eeee6_Vector-1.svg)

[support@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:support@tokenmetrics.com)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6360cb77798bc2d41f046650_Contact_icon.svg)

###### Press & Media

Are you a journalist? Please contact us for all press inquiries at this email.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/603f16412d15ef27b82eeee6_Vector-1.svg)

[press@tokenmetrics.com](mailto:press@tokenmetrics.com)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63591461da09771a32758924_Ellipse%20yellow.png)

## Frequently Asked Questions

If you are hesitating, do not worry - we are here to explaineverything you might want to know. Let us help!

What do I get in the 7-day free trial?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You get access to all the features promised on the Pricing page to see for yourself how powerful our AI-based crypto research platform is, helping you find profitable opportunities.

Do I get charged automatically after the trial ends?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

Yes, our payment processor will try to charge the card on your account after your trial period is over.

Can I cancel my account?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

If you feel like you’re not ready to use Token Metrics yet, you can cancel your plan any time you want by going to your Settings page and under the Subscription tab.

Can I get a refund?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

As long as you cancel your plan within 7 days of subscription, you can ask for the refund by contacting our support team on the website. This is more than enough to test our platform and see if it works for you.

Can I pay with Crypto?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

For now, we only accept debit and credit cards. However, we are actively working on accepting more payment types.

Can I get a free trial to test the VIP plan?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You can not sign up for a trial VIP plan at this moment.

Can I upgrade my account in the future to access more features?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

Yes, you can upgrade any time you want to make the best out of Token Metrics. You will be issued a pro-rated refund for unused days on the current plan and then upgraded to the new plan.

How can I join the private Telegram groups for each plan?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

You can join our private Telegram groups to discuss cryptocurrencies by sending our bot a message at [@token\_metrics\_bot](https://www.tokenmetrics.com/contact-us#) on Telegram.

Does Token Metrics trade for me?

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/600a7682415ab7d3aafe3a5c/60151633cb58213f20aa80ae_Group%20434.svg)

No, Token Metrics does not trade for you. You have to make your own investment decisions after doing your own research.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/63591461c338fa894d2a0dce_Ellipse%20blue.png)

### Create Your Free Token Metrics Account

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6351259e6a3cb512ba070c61_check-line.svg)

Access our Analytics Platform for valuable token insights

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/634054bf0f60201ce9b30604/6351259e6a3cb512ba070c61_check-line.svg)

Stay in the loop with exclusive weekly Newsletters filled with insider tips and updates
